project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the Tongbai Pumped Storage Project, are to increase capacity, to further improve power load capability, and quality in the Zhejiang, and East China power systems, and, to improve the operational and investment efficiency in power generation, by implementing competitive generation markets in the Zhejiang Province. These objectives will be supported by the following components: 1) The development of the Tongbai pumped storage power plant, based on an existing upper reservoir, will consist of a new lower reservoir, impounded by a dam, with connecting tunnels, and an underground powerhouse. An environmental management plan will be implemented, as will a resettlement action plan to protect the affected population. In addition, the component includes consulting services, for engineering, design, procurement, and construction management assistance. 2) The transmission reinforcement comprises erection of twin transmission lines connecting the Tongbai plant to a 500 kv grid, and construction of substations. Existing substation lines will be expanded, and telecommunication equipment will be supplied, covering customer service centers. 3) A competitive program for power market development, and sector restructuring will be implemented.

P056424.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>中国桐柏抽水蓄能项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是通过在浙江省发展竞争性发电市场增加发电能力，进一步提高浙江省和华东电力系统的功率载荷，提高发电行业运行和投资效率。为实现这些目标，将设置下列子项目：（1）桐柏抽水蓄能电站子项目。电站将依托现有上游水库建设，包括新建下游水库及其大坝和连接隧道以及地下厂房。本子项目将实施环境管理计划和移民行动计划，后者旨在保护受影响人口利益。此外，本子项目还包括工程、设计、采购和施工管理方面的咨询服务；（2）输电线路加固子项目，其具体内容包括架设将桐柏电站接入500千伏电网的双回路输电线路、新建变电站。将延长现有变电站线路，供应电信设备，包括客户服务中心设备；（3）将实施竞争机制，促进电力市场发展，也将开展电力行业结构调整。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
